title: Support Preferences and Clinical Decision Support Systems (CDSS) in the Clinical Care of Autistic Children: Stakeholder Perspectives
details: R Sulek, J Robertson, E Goodall, AWC Liew, S Pillar… - Advances in …, 2024
abstract: Objectives Clinical decision support systems (CDSS) are increasingly utilised within healthcare settings to enhance decision making. However, few studies have investigated their application in the context of clinical services for autistic people, with …

title: Open E-Survey on the Use and Perception of Chatbots in Vascular Surgery
details: F Lareyre, C Caroline, V Jongkind, MR Smeds, B Nasr… - EJVES Vascular Forum, 2024
abstract: Objective Large language models and artificial intelligence (AI) based chatbots have brought new insights in healthcare, but they also raise major concerns. Their applications in vascular surgery have scarcely been investigated to date. This …
